name: Tangerine
summary_text: A hooker tears through Tinseltown on Christmas Eve searching for the pimp who broke her heart.

name: Look Who's Talking Now
summary_text: The dogs can talk at a family of 4, where mom loses her job the same day dad gets a job as pilot for a cute, single boss.

name: Clouds of Sils Maria
summary_text: A film star comes face-to-face with an uncomfortable reflection of herself while starring in a revival of the play that launched her career.

name: Blindspotting
summary_text: While on probation, a man begins to re-evaluate his relationship with his volatile best friend.

name: The Oxford Murders
summary_text: At Oxford University, a professor and a grad student work together to try to stop a potential series of murders seemingly linked by mathematical symbols.

name: Temple Grandin
summary_text: A biopic of Temple Grandin, an autistic woman who has become one of the top scientists in the humane livestock handling industry.

name: Delhi Belly
summary_text: Three struggling room-mates unknowingly become potential prey of a ruthless gangster.

name: Tau
summary_text: A woman is held captive by a scientist in a futuristic smart house, and hopes to escape by reasoning with the Artificial Intelligence that controls the house.

name: Raatchasan
summary_text: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

name: Hellraiser III: Hell on Earth
summary_text: An investigative reporter must send the newly unbound Pinhead and his legions back to Hell.

name: Mighty Joe Young
summary_text: A legendary fifteen-foot tall mountain gorilla named Joe is taken to an animal sanctuary in California by zoologist Gregg O'Hara (Bill Paxton) and Jill Young (Charlize Theron), with whom he grew up. Poacher Strasser (Rade Serbedzija) returns from the past to seek vengeance on Joe.

name: The Conspirator
summary_text: Mary Surratt is the lone female charged as a co-conspirator in the assassination trial of Abraham Lincoln. As the whole nation turns against her, she is forced to rely on her reluctant lawyer to uncover the truth and save her life.

name: A Little Bit of Heaven
summary_text: An irreverent young woman who uses her humor to prevent matters from getting serious has a life-changing visit with her doctor.

name: Hard to Kill
summary_text: Left for dead with his wife killed in their house, L.A. Detective Mason Storm will have to make a quick recovery, expose those behind the murder and take revenge.

name: Husbands and Wives
summary_text: When their best friends announce that they're separating, a professor and his wife discover the faults in their own marriage.

name: A Lonely Place to Die
summary_text: A group of mountaineers in the Scottish Highlands discover a kidnapped girl and are pursued by her captors.

name: Things We Lost in the Fire
summary_text: A recent widow invites her husband's troubled best friend to live with her and her two children. As he gradually turns his life around, he helps the family cope and confront their loss.

name: #Alive
summary_text: The rapid spread of an unknown infection has left an entire city in ungovernable chaos, but one survivor remains alive in isolation. It is his story.

name: Tsotsi
summary_text: Six days in the violent life of a young Johannesburg gang leader.

name: Heartbeats
summary_text: The story of three close friends who are involved in a love-triangle.

name: I Lost My Body
summary_text: A story of Naoufel, a young man who is in love with Gabrielle. In another part of town, a severed hand escapes from a dissection lab, determined to find its body again.

name: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
summary_text: The magical inhabitants of a rainforest fight to save their home, which is threatened by logging and a polluting force of destruction called Hexxus.

name: A Bigger Splash
summary_text: The vacation of a famous rock star and her boyfriend in Italy is disrupted by the unexpected visit of an old friend and his daughter.

name: Cam
summary_text: Alice, an ambitious camgirl, wakes up one day to discover she's been replaced on her show with an exact replica of herself.

name: Malcolm & Marie
summary_text: A director and his girlfriend's relationship is tested after they return home from his movie premiere and face each other's turmoil during one long night.

name: Inherit the Wind
summary_text: Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.

name: Palo Alto
summary_text: An unflinching portrait of adolescent lust, boredom, and self-destruction that centers around a shy young girl on the cusp of an illicit relationship with her soccer coach.

name: Casino Royale
summary_text: In an early spy spoof, aging Sir James Bond comes out of retirement to take on SMERSH.

name: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
summary_text: A teenage girl is convinced that her home city revolves around her until her family packs up and moves to the suburbs, where she finds herself competing for attention.

name: The Conformist
summary_text: A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.

name: Species II
summary_text: An astronaut gets infected with alien DNA during the first mission on Mars and runs amok on earth. Preston and Laura team up with a peaceful, genetically re-engineered Sil to track the monster down.

name: Lupin the Third: Castle of Cagliostro
summary_text: A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and an intrepid policeman struggle to free a princess from an evil count's clutches, and learn the hidden secret to a fabulous treasure that she holds part of a key to.

name: The China Syndrome
summary_text: A reporter finds what appears to be a cover-up of safety hazards at a nuclear power plant.

name: A Brilliant Young Mind
summary_text: A socially awkward teenage math prodigy finds new confidence and new friendships when he lands a spot on the British squad at the International Mathematics Olympiad.

name: Nell
summary_text: In a remote woodland cabin, a small town doctor discovers Nell - a beautiful young hermit woman with many secrets.

name: Funny Face
summary_text: An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion model discovery in the shop clerk.

name: Cuties
summary_text: Amy, an 11-year-old girl, joins a group of dancers named "the cuties" at school, and rapidly grows aware of her burgeoning femininity - upsetting her mother and her values in the process.

name: Outland
summary_text: A federal marshal stationed at a mining colony on the Jupiter moon of Io uncovers a drug-smuggling conspiracy. He gets no help from the workers or authorities when he finds himself marked for murder.

name: A Civil Action
summary_text: A tenacious lawyer takes on a case involving a major company responsible for causing several people to be diagnosed with leukemia due to the town's water supply being contaminated, at the risk of bankrupting his firm and career.

name: Broadcast News
summary_text: Take two rival television reporters: one handsome, one talented, both male. Add one Producer, female. Mix well, and watch the sparks fly.

name: The Strangers: Prey at Night
summary_text: A family of four staying at a secluded mobile home park for the night are stalked and then hunted by three masked psychopaths.

name: Mohabbatein
summary_text: A film about the battle between love and fear, between two stubborn men and their opposing beliefs and the outcome of the love stories of 3 couples.

name: But I'm a Cheerleader
summary_text: A naive teenager is sent to rehab camp when her straitlaced parents and friends suspect her of being a lesbian.

name: The Next Karate Kid
summary_text: Mr. Miyagi is back and he takes a new pupil under his wing: a troubled adolescent girl.

name: I Spit on Your Grave 2
summary_text: When Katie innocently accepts an offer to have new photos taken for her portfolio, the experience quickly turns into a nightmare of rape, torture and kidnapping. Now, she will have to find the strength to exact her brutal revenge.

name: Fortress
summary_text: In a future, private underground prison/Fortress, the inmates are computer controlled with CCTV, dream readers and devices that can cause pain or death. John and his illegally pregnant wife are inside but want to escape before birth.

name: Rabbit-Proof Fence
summary_text: In 1931, three half-white, half-Aboriginal girls escape after being plucked from their houses to be trained as domestic staff, and set off on a journey across the Outback.

name: Sleepaway Camp
summary_text: Angela Baker, a shy, traumatized young girl, is sent to summer camp with her cousin. Shortly after her arrival, anyone with sinister or less than honorable intentions gets their comeuppance.

name: Braven
summary_text: A logger defends his family from a group of dangerous drug runners.

name: Primary Colors
summary_text: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for President of the U.S.

name: The Wandering Earth
summary_text: As the sun is dying out, people all around the world build giant planet thrusters to move Earth out of its orbit and sail Earth to a new star system. Yet the 2500-year journey comes with unexpected dangers, and in order to save humanity, a group of young people in this age of a wandering Earth fight hard for the survival of humankind.

name: Udta Punjab
summary_text: A story that revolves around drug abuse in the affluent north Indian State of Punjab and how the youth there have succumbed to it en-masse resulting in a socio-economic decline.

name: Cronos
summary_text: A mysterious device designed to provide its owner with eternal life resurfaces after four hundred years, leaving a trail of destruction in its path.

name: The Lady from Shanghai
summary_text: Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.

name: The Innocents
summary_text: A young governess for two children becomes convinced that the house and grounds are haunted.

name: Gringo
summary_text: GRINGO, a dark comedy mixed with white-knuckle action and dramatic intrigue, explores the battle of survival for businessman Harold Soyinka (David Oyelowo) when he finds himself crossing the line from law-abiding citizen to wanted criminal.

name: In a Lonely Place
summary_text: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.

name: Thelma
summary_text: A confused religious girl tries to deny her feelings for a female friend who's in love with her. This causes her suppressed subconsciously-controlled psychokinetic powers to reemerge with devastating results.

name: Take This Waltz
summary_text: A happily married woman falls for the artist who lives across the street.

name: 12 Rounds
summary_text: Detective Danny Fisher discovers his girlfriend has been kidnapped by an ex-con tied to Fisher's past, and he'll have to successfully complete 12 challenges in order to secure her safe release.

name: Between Two Ferns: The Movie
summary_text: Zach Galifianakis and his oddball crew take a road trip to complete a series of high-profile celebrity interviews.

name: 24: Redemption
summary_text: Jack Bauer confronts African dictator Benjamin Juma, whose forces have been ordered to capture the children Bauer oversees for malicious military training.

name: Serena
summary_text: In Depression-era North Carolina, the future of George Pemberton's timber empire becomes complicated when he marries Serena.

name: Ruby & Quentin
summary_text: A tough criminal is arrested after hiding the loot from a Paris armored truck robbery. A talkative dimwit befriends him in prison and escapes with him - chased by police and his evil crime boss.

name: To the Wonder
summary_text: After falling in love in Paris, Marina and Neil come to Oklahoma, where problems arise. Their church's Spanish-born pastor struggles with his faith, while Neil encounters a woman from his childhood.

name: Serial Mom
summary_text: She's the perfect all-American parent: a great cook and homemaker, a devoted recycler, and a woman who'll literally kill to keep her children happy.

name: The Bad Batch
summary_text: In a desert dystopia, a young woman is kidnapped by cannibals.

name: The Quiet American
summary_text: An old British reporter vies with a young U.S. doctor for the affections of a beautiful Vietnamese woman.

name: Charlie Countryman
summary_text: While travelling abroad, a guy falls for a Romanian beauty whose unreachable heart has its origins in her violent, charismatic ex.

name: Now and Then
summary_text: Four 12-year-old girls grow up together during an eventful small-town summer in 1970.

name: Fist of Fury
summary_text: A young man seeks vengence for the death of his teacher.

name: The Replacement Killers
summary_text: A troubled hitman seeks aid from a forger to help him get papers to China. However, the drug lord has hired replacements to finish the job, and kill the hitman.

name: Waiting for Guffman
summary_text: An aspiring director and the marginally talented amateur cast of a hokey small-town Missouri musical production go overboard when they learn that someone from Broadway will be in attendance.

name: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants 2
summary_text: Four college freshmen and best friends find that it may take more than a shared pair of jeans to help them stay in touch as their lives go in different directions.

name: The Good Lie
summary_text: A group of Sudanese refugees, given the chance to resettle in the U.S., arrive in Kansas City, Missouri, where their encounter with an employment agency counselor forever changes all of their lives.

name: Runaway Train
summary_text: Two escaped convicts and a female railway worker find themselves trapped on a train with no brakes and nobody driving.

name: Torque
summary_text: A biker returns from Thailand to set things straight with his girlfriend. One gang leader wants him for delivery of 2 motorbikes filled with crystal meth and another gang leader wants him for murdering his brother.

name: You Don't Know Jack
summary_text: A look at the life and work of doctor-assisted suicide advocate Jack Kevorkian.

name: Creature from the Black Lagoon
summary_text: A strange prehistoric beast lurks in the depths of the Amazonian jungle. A group of scientists try to capture the animal and bring it back to civilization for study.

name: Air America
summary_text: A young pilot finds himself recruited unwittingly into a covert and corrupt C.I.A. airlift organization operating in Vietnam War-era Laos.

name: Somewhere in Time
summary_text: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

name: Drop Dead Fred
summary_text: A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.

name: Code Name: K.O.Z.
summary_text: A look at the 17-25 December 2013 corruption scandal in Turkey, from the viewpoint of the Erdogan government.

name: Joint Security Area
summary_text: After a shooting incident at the North/South Korean border/DMZ leaves 2 North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss/Swedish team investigates, what actually happened.

name: The Witches
summary_text: A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader.

name: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer
summary_text: A misfit reindeer and his friends look for a place that will accept them.

name: The Taking of Deborah Logan
summary_text: An elderly woman battling Alzheimer's disease agrees to let a film crew document her condition, but what they discover is something far more sinister going on.

name: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
summary_text: In New York, armed men hijack a subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. Even if it's paid, how could they get away?

name: Sightseers
summary_text: Chris wants to show girlfriend Tina his world, but events soon conspire against the couple and their dream caravan holiday takes a very wrong turn.

name: The Virgin Spring
summary_text: An innocent yet pampered young virgin and her family's pregnant and jealous servant set out to deliver candles to church, but only one returns from events that transpire in the woods along the way.

name: Pollock
summary_text: A film about the life and career of the American painter, Jackson Pollock.

name: Rare Exports
summary_text: In the depths of the Korvatunturi mountains, 486 meters deep, lies the closest ever guarded secret of Christmas. The time has come to dig it up. This Christmas everyone will believe in Santa Claus.

name: White Bird in a Blizzard
summary_text: In 1988, a teenage girl's life is thrown into chaos when her mother disappears.

name: Silent Running
summary_text: In a future where all flora is extinct on Earth, an astronaut is given orders to destroy the last of Earth's botany, kept in a greenhouse aboard a spacecraft.

name: L'Avventura
summary_text: A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip. During the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.

name: Suck Me Shakespeer
summary_text: A comedy that follows an ex-convict who lands a position at a school that sits over the spot where money from one of his earlier robberies was stashed.

name: The Rules of the Game
summary_text: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.

name: Dil Se..
summary_text: A radio broadcaster's intense attraction to a mysterious woman opens the door to a tidal wave of powerful emotions and desires.

name: The Thin Man
summary_text: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

name: Memphis Belle
summary_text: In 1943, the crew of a B-17 based in UK prepares for its 25th and last bombing mission over Germany before returning home to the USA.

name: The Ladykillers
summary_text: Five oddball criminals planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.

name: Third Person
summary_text: Three interlocking love stories involving three couples in three cities: Rome, Paris, and New York.

name: Dirty Dancing: Havana Nights
summary_text: High school senior Katey moves to Havana in November 1958, when her dad gets a promotion at Ford. She meets a local waiter, who introduces her to sensual Cuban music/dance. They enter a big dance contest for the prize when he gets fired.

name: Testament of Youth
summary_text: A British woman recalls coming of age during World War I - a story of young love, the futility of war, and how to make sense of the darkest times.

name: Riding in Cars with Boys
summary_text: A single mother, with dreams of becoming a writer, has a son at the age of 15 in 1965, and goes through a failed marriage with the drug-addicted father.

name: Aashiqui 2
summary_text: Rahul loses his fans and fame due to alcoholism. But he then decides to turn a small time singer into a rising star.

name: Game Over, Man!
summary_text: Three friends are on the verge of getting their video game financed when their benefactor is taken hostage by terrorists.

name: Thanks for Sharing
summary_text: A romantic comedy that brings together three disparate characters who are learning to face a challenging and often confusing world as they struggle together against a common demon: sex addiction.

name: Raise Your Voice
summary_text: A girl from a small town heads to the big city of Los Angeles to spend the summer at a performing arts high school.

name: Murder in the First
summary_text: An eager and idealistic young attorney defends an Alcatraz prisoner accused of murdering a fellow inmate. The extenuating circumstances: his client had just spent over three years in solitary confinement.

name: Kabir Singh
summary_text: An exalted but short-fused surgeon plunges into a spiral of drugs, alcohol and rage after his intense relationship with his girlfriend turbulently ends.

name: The Mosquito Coast
summary_text: An inventor spurns his city life and moves his family into the jungles of Central America to make a utopia.

name: Yours, Mine & Ours
summary_text: A widowed Coast Guard Admiral and a widow handbag designer fall in love and marry, much to the dismay of her 10 and his 8 children.

name: Peaceful Warrior
summary_text: A chance encounter with a stranger changes the life of a college gymnast.

name: The Nut Job
summary_text: An incorrigibly self-serving exiled squirrel finds himself helping his former park brethren survive by raiding a nut store, a location that also happens to be a front for a human gang's bank robbery.

name: What Maisie Knew
summary_text: In New York City, a young girl is caught in the middle of her parents' bitter custody battle.

name: Win a Date with Tad Hamilton!
summary_text: A small-town girl wins a date with a male celebrity through a contest. When the date goes better than expected, a love triangle forms between the girl, the male celebrity, and the girl's best friend.

name: The Blue Elephant
summary_text: The story of Dr. Yehia, a psychotherapist at Al Abbasia hospital. He works in the department treating the criminally insane, only to find his best friend to be one of the patients. Trying ...                See full summary »

name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules
summary_text: Back in middle school after summer vacation, Greg Heffley and his older brother Rodrick must deal with their parents' misguided attempts to have them bond.

name: Taxi 4
summary_text: Daniel, the driver of a very special taxi in Marseille, gets a famous soccer player to the stadium in time and later helps his clumsy police friend Émilien catch the dangerous Belgian after he escaped on Émilien's guard.

name: A Mighty Heart
summary_text: Mariane Pearl embarks on a frantic search to locate her journalist husband, Daniel, when he goes missing in Pakistan.

name: Department Q: The Keeper of Lost Causes
summary_text: Police inspector Carl Mørck is put in charge of a department of cold cases, joined only by his assistant, Assad. They dig into a case about a disappeared woman.

name: The Long Goodbye
summary_text: Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend out of a jam, but in doing so gets implicated in his wife's murder.

name: The Lady in the Van
summary_text: A man forms an unexpected bond with a transient woman living in her van that's parked in his driveway.

name: Max Manus: Man of War
summary_text: The true story about one of the most brilliant saboteurs during World War II and his battle to overcome his inner demons.

name: The Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death
summary_text: 40 years after the first haunting at Eel Marsh House, a group of children evacuated from WWII London arrives, awakening the house's darkest inhabitant.

name: Highway
summary_text: Right before her wedding, a young woman finds herself abducted and held for ransom. As the initial days pass, she begins to develop a strange bond with her kidnapper.

name: Secretariat
summary_text: Penny Chenery Tweedy and colleagues guide her long-shot but precocious stallion to set, in 1973, the unbeaten record for winning the Triple Crown.

name: Lifeboat
summary_text: Several survivors of a torpedoed merchant ship in World War II find themselves in the same lifeboat with one of the crew members of the U-boat that sank their ship.

name: Vanishing Point
summary_text: During the 1970s, car delivery driver Kowalski delivers hot rods in record time but always runs into trouble with the highway cops.

name: Good Burger
summary_text: A dim-witted teenager and his new coworker try to save the old burger joint they work for from failing after the opening of a brand new burger restaurant across the street, which's planning to put them out of business.

name: Escape from Pretoria
summary_text: Based on the real-life prison break of two political captives, Escape From Pretoria is a race-against-time thriller set in the tumultuous apartheid days of South Africa.

name: Cape Fear
summary_text: A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.

name: Tale of Tales
summary_text: From the bitter quest of the Queen of Longtrellis, to two mysterious sisters who provoke the passion of a king, to the King of Highhills obsessed with a giant Flea, these tales are inspired by the fairytales by Giambattista Basile.

name: Stick It
summary_text: After a run-in with the law, Haley Graham (Missy Peregrym) is forced to return to the world from which she fled some years ago. Enrolled in an elite gymnastics program run by the legendary Burt Vickerman (Jeff Bridges), Haley's rebellious attitude gives way to something that just might be called team spirit.

name: Son of a Gun
summary_text: JR busts out of prison with Brendan Lynch, Australia's most notorious criminal, and joins Lynch's gang for a gold heist that soon pits the two men against one another.

name: Virus
summary_text: After outrunning a typhoon at sea, a strong-willed tugboat navigator and her crew discover a high-tech alien life form that's taken control of a Russian research vessel and aims to destroy on a massive scale.

name: Freeway
summary_text: A twisted take on "Little Red Riding Hood", with a teenage juvenile delinquent on the run from a social worker travelling to her grandmother's house and being hounded by a charming, but sadistic, serial killer and pedophile.

name: Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom
summary_text: A chronicle of Nelson Mandela's life journey from his childhood in a rural village through to his inauguration as the first democratically elected president of South Africa.

name: Summer Wars
summary_text: A student tries to fix a problem he accidentally caused in OZ, a digital world, while pretending to be the fiancé of his friend at her grandmother's 90th birthday.

name: Loser
summary_text: A college student, branded a loser by his roommates and booted from the dorm, falls in love with a coed who has eyes for their condescending professor.

name: Pump Up the Volume
summary_text: Mark runs a pirate radio station and causes an uproar when he speaks his mind and enthralls fellow teens.

name: Marrowbone
summary_text: A young man and his three younger siblings, who have kept secret the death of their beloved mother in order to remain together, are plagued by a sinister presence in the sprawling manor in which they live.

name: Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day
summary_text: Guinevere Pettigrew, a middle-aged London governess, finds herself unfairly dismissed from her job. An attempt to gain new employment catapults her into the glamorous world and dizzying social whirl of an American actress and singer, Delysia Lafosse.

name: Dead End
summary_text: Christmas Eve. On his way to his in-laws with his family, Frank Harrington decides to try a shortcut, for the first time in 20 years. It turns out to be the biggest mistake of his life.

name: Bugsy
summary_text: The story of how Benjamin "Bugsy" Siegel started Las Vegas.

name: Sophie Scholl: The Final Days
summary_text: A dramatization of the final days of Sophie Scholl, one of the most famous members of the German World War II anti-Nazi resistance movement, The White Rose.

name: Table 19
summary_text: Eloise, having been relieved of maid of honor duties after being unceremoniously dumped by the best man via text, decides to attend the wedding anyway, only to find herself seated with five fellow unwanted guests at the dreaded Table 19.

name: The Resident
summary_text: When a young doctor suspects she may not be alone in her new Brooklyn loft, she learns that her landlord has formed a frightening obsession with her.

name: El Topo
summary_text: A mysterious black-clad gunfighter wanders a mystical Western landscape encountering multiple bizarre characters.

name: Boomerang
summary_text: A successful executive and womanizer finds his lifestyle choices have turned back on him when his new female boss turns out to be an even bigger deviant than he is.

name: What Just Happened
summary_text: Two weeks in the life of a fading Hollywood producer who's having a rough time trying to get his new picture made.

name: Thief
summary_text: An ace safe cracker wants to do one last big heist for the mob before going straight.

name: The Indian in the Cupboard
summary_text: Omri, a young boy growing up in Brooklyn, receives an odd variety of presents for his birthday: a wooden cabinet from his older brother, a set of antique keys from his mother and a tiny plastic model of an Indian from his best friend Patrick.

name: Kundun
summary_text: From childhood to adulthood, Tibet's fourteenth Dalai Lama deals with Chinese oppression and other problems.

name: Turbo Kid
summary_text: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland in 1997, a comic book fan adopts the persona of his favourite hero to save his enthusiastic friend and fight a tyrannical overlord.

name: I Kill Giants
summary_text: Barbara Thorson struggles through life by escaping into a fantasy life of magic and monsters.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods
summary_text: The Z-Fighters must contend with Lord Beerus, the God of Destruction, but only a God can fight a God, and none of them are Gods. However with the creation of the Super Saiyan God, will the Z-Fighters be able to defeat Lord Beerus?

name: The Kid with a Bike
summary_text: Abandoned by his father, a young boy is left in a state-run youth farm. In a random act of kindness, the town hair-dresser agrees to foster him on week-ends.

name: The Exorcist III
summary_text: A police Lieutenant uncovers more than he bargained for as his investigation of a series of murders, which have all the hallmarks of the deceased Gemini serial killer, leads him to question the patients of a psychiatric ward.

name: The Brood
summary_text: A man tries to uncover an unconventional psychologist's therapy techniques on his institutionalized wife, amidst a series of brutal murders.

name: Leaves of Grass
summary_text: An Ivy League professor is lured back to his Oklahoma hometown, where his twin brother, a small-time pot grower, has concocted a scheme to take down a local drug lord.

name: Tanu Weds Manu Returns
summary_text: Tanu and Manu's marriage collapses. What happens when Manu meets Tanu's lookalike Kusum - and when Tanu returns?

name: Little Giants
summary_text: Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

name: Suicide Kings
summary_text: A group of youngsters kidnap a respected Mafia figure.

name: Cutthroat Island
summary_text: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

name: Mask
summary_text: A teenager with a massive facial skull deformity and biker gang mother attempt to live as normal a life as possible under the circumstances.

name: Playing It Cool
summary_text: Unrequited love motivates a guy to write about his experiences.

name: Stealing Beauty
summary_text: After her mother commits suicide, a young woman travels to Italy in search of love, truth and a deeper connection with herself.

name: Your Sister's Sister
summary_text: Iris invites her friend Jack to stay at her family's island getaway after the death of his brother. At their remote cabin, Jack's drunken encounter with Hannah, Iris' sister, kicks off a revealing stretch of days.

name: Tekken
summary_text: Jin Kazama witnesses the death of his mother Jun by Tekken in the slums known as Anvil. After finding a Tekken ID he decides to seek out vengeance for his mother's death.

name: Fantastic Planet
summary_text: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

name: A Mighty Wind
summary_text: Mockumentary captures the reunion of 1960s folk trio the Folksmen as they prepare for a show at The Town Hall to memorialize a recently deceased concert promoter.

name: Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead
summary_text: Five different criminals face imminent death after botching a job quite badly.

name: Mr. Church
summary_text: "Mr. Church" tells the story of a unique friendship that develops when a little girl and her dying mother retain the services of a talented cook - Henry Joseph Church. What begins as a six month arrangement instead spans into fifteen years and creates a family bond that lasts forever.

name: Reno 911! Miami
summary_text: A rag-tag team of Reno cops are called in to save the day after a terrorist attack disrupts a national police convention in Miami Beach during spring break. Based on the Comedy Central series.

name: God's Own Country
summary_text: Spring. Yorkshire. Young farmer Johnny Saxby numbs his daily frustrations with binge drinking and casual sex, until the arrival of a Romanian migrant worker for lambing season ignites an intense relationship that sets Johnny on a new path.

name: The Jane Austen Book Club
summary_text: Six Californians start a club to discuss the works of Jane Austen, only to find their relationships -- both old and new -- begin to resemble 21st century versions of her novels.

name: Dead Again
summary_text: A woman who has lost her memory is taken in by a Los Angeles orphanage, and a private eye is enlisted to track down her identity, but he soon finds that he might have a past life connection to her that endangers their lives.

name: Mystic Pizza
summary_text: Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in the Connecticut town of Mystic.

name: Gettysburg
summary_text: In 1863, the Northern and Southern forces fight at Gettysburg in the decisive battle of the American Civil War.

name: A Shot in the Dark
summary_text: Inspector Jacques Clouseau investigates the murder of Mr. Benjamin Ballon's driver at a country estate.

name: Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging
summary_text: The story centers on a 14-year-old girl who keeps a diary about the ups and downs of being a teenager, including the things she learns about kissing.

name: Possession
summary_text: A woman starts exhibiting increasingly disturbing behavior after asking her husband for a divorce. Suspicions of infidelity soon give way to something much more sinister.

name: The Thing from Another World
summary_text: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.

name: I Spit on Your Grave
summary_text: An aspiring writer is repeatedly gang-raped, humiliated, and left for dead by four men whom she systematically hunts down to seek revenge.

name: Disobedience
summary_text: A woman returns to her Orthodox Jewish community that shunned her for her attraction to a female childhood friend. Once back, their passions reignite as they explore the boundaries of faith and sexuality.

name: Pom Poko
summary_text: A community of magical shape-shifting raccoon dogs struggle to prevent their forest home from being destroyed by urban development.

name: Beyond Borders
summary_text: The world's cruelty is confronted with the love of two different people who try to save mankind from poverty and war.

name: Mersal
summary_text: A magician and a doctor attempt to expose the corruption at the heart of India's medical industry.

name: Baazigar
summary_text: A young man with a vendetta against a business tycoon seduces his younger daughter, but she begins to suspect her new lover's connection with her elder sister and his ulterior motive.

name: Play Misty for Me
summary_text: The life of a disc jockey is turned upside down after a romantic encounter with an obsessed fan.

name: UHF
summary_text: An unemployed visionary becomes the manager of a local television station. The station becomes a success, with all sorts of hilarious sight gags and wacky humor.

name: Bio-Dome
summary_text: Moronic best friends get themselves locked inside the Bio-Dome, a science experiment, along with a group of environmental scientists for one year.

name: Arthur
summary_text: Alcoholic billionaire playboy Arthur Bach must marry a woman he does not love, or he will be cut off from his $750,000,000 fortune. But when Arthur falls in love with a poor waitress, he must decide if he wants to choose love or money.

name: Ip Man 4: The Finale
summary_text: The Kung Fu master travels to the U.S. where his student has upset the local martial arts community by opening a Wing Chun school.

name: Ruthless People
summary_text: A couple, cheated by a vile businessman, kidnap his wife in retaliation, without knowing that their enemy is delighted they did.

name: The Magdalene Sisters
summary_text: Three young Irish women struggle to maintain their spirits while they endure dehumanizing abuse as inmates of a Magdalene Sisters Asylum.

name: Metro
summary_text: A Hostage Negotiator teams up with a Sharpshooter to bring down a dangerous jewel thief.

name: Cry Wolf
summary_text: Eight unsuspecting high school seniors at a posh boarding school, who delight themselves on playing games of lies, come face-to-face with terror and learn that nobody believes a liar - even when they're telling the truth.

name: The Wrong Man
summary_text: In 1953, an innocent man named Christopher Emanuel "Manny" Balestrero is arrested after being mistaken for an armed robber.

name: Marvin's Room
summary_text: After seventeen years, a fiercely independent woman and her rebellious son return home and together they turn the family she left behind upside down.

name: Beethoven's 2nd
summary_text: Beethoven, the St. Bernard dog, becomes a father, but his girlfriend Missy is dognapped, and his puppies are in danger of the same fate.

name: The Art of Racing in the Rain
summary_text: Through his bond with his owner, aspiring Formula One race car driver Denny, golden retriever Enzo learns that the techniques needed on the racetrack can also be used to successfully navigate the journey of life.

name: SLC Punk!
summary_text: In the early 1980s Stevo and Heroin Bob are the only two dedicated punks in conservative Salt Lake City.

name: See No Evil
summary_text: A group of delinquents are sent to clean the Blackwell Hotel. Little do they know reclusive psychopath Jacob Goodnight has holed away in the rotting hotel. When one of the teens is captured, those who remain - a group that includes the cop who put a bullet in Goodnight's head four years ago - band together to survive against the brutal killer.

name: Risen
summary_text: In 33 AD, a Roman Tribune in Judea is tasked to find the missing body of Jesus Christ, who rose from the dead.

name: Queen & Slim
summary_text: A couple's first date takes an unexpected turn when a police officer pulls them over.

name: Ned Kelly
summary_text: An innocent man becomes one of the most wanted criminals the world has ever known.

name: Mystery Train
summary_text: Three stories are connected by a Memphis hotel and the spirit of Elvis Presley.

name: Wonder Wheel
summary_text: On Coney Island in the 1950s, a lifeguard tells the story of a middle-aged carousel operator, his beleaguered wife, and the visitor who turns their lives upside-down.

name: I Know Who Killed Me
summary_text: A young woman who was missing reappears, but she claims to be someone else entirely.

name: The Boys from Brazil
summary_text: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

name: Destroyer
summary_text: A police detective reconnects with people from an undercover assignment in her distant past in order to make peace.

name: The Watcher
summary_text: David Allen Griffin is a cool killer- time and time again, he chooses a female victim, studies her for weeks till he knows her routine to the smallest detail, makes meticulous preparations ...                See full summary »

name: Hollywood Ending
summary_text: A director is forced to work with his ex-wife, who left him for the boss of the studio bankrolling his new film. But the night before the first day of shooting, he develops a case of psychosomatic blindness.

name: Cell
summary_text: When a mysterious cell phone signal causes apocalyptic chaos, an artist is determined to reunite with his young son in New England.

name: You Got Served
summary_text: In order to achieve their dream of opening a recording studio, two friends (Omarion, Houston) must first win their city's dance contest -- a fierce competition that pits them against a group of tough street dancers.

name: Raazi
summary_text: A Kashmiri woman agrees to marry a Pakistani army officer in order to spy on Pakistan during the Indo-Pakistan War of 1971.

name: Rollerball
summary_text: The big thing in 2005 is a violent sport which can have some pretty serious consequences... like dying.

name: Heaven Is for Real
summary_text: A small-town father must find the courage and conviction to share his son's extraordinary, life-changing experience with the world.

name: The Bay
summary_text: Chaos breaks out in a small Maryland town after an ecological disaster occurs.

name: The Professor
summary_text: A college professor lives his life with reckless abandon after being diagnosed with a terminal illness.

name: Selena
summary_text: The true story of Selena, a Texas-born Tejano singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart topping albums on the Latin music charts.

name: Gretel & Hansel
summary_text: A long time ago in a distant fairy tale countryside, a young girl leads her little brother into a dark wood in desperate search of food and work, only to stumble upon a nexus of terrifying evil.

name: Friday After Next
summary_text: Working as security guards, Craig and Day-Day run into the thief who stole their Christmas presents.

name: The Warlords
summary_text: China, 1860s: Having his army slaughtered, General Qingyun joins 2 bandit leaders in raids on rebels and in blood oath. They form a Qing loyal army with eyes on rebel held Suzhou and Nanjing.

name: Max
summary_text: A military dog that helped American Marines in Afghanistan returns to the United States and is adopted by his handler's family after suffering a traumatic experience.

name: Zombie
summary_text: Strangers searching for a young woman's missing father arrive at a tropical island where a doctor desperately seeks the cause and cure of a recent epidemic of the undead.

name: Valentine
summary_text: Five women are stalked by an unknown assailant while preparing for Valentine's Day.

name: Dom Hemingway
summary_text: After spending 12 years in prison for keeping his mouth shut, notorious safe-cracker Dom Hemingway is back on the streets of London looking to collect what he's owed.

name: Top Five
summary_text: A comedian tries to make it as a serious actor when his reality television star fiancée talks him into broadcasting their wedding on her television show.

name: Book Club
summary_text: Four lifelong friends have their lives forever changed after reading 50 Shades of Grey in their monthly book club.

name: Thuppakki
summary_text: An army captain is on a mission to track down and destroy a terrorist gang and deactivate the sleeper cells under its command.

name: Weathering with You
summary_text: A high-school boy who has run away to Tokyo befriends a girl who appears to be able to manipulate the weather.

name: Mistress America
summary_text: A lonely college freshman's life is turned upside-down by her impetuous, adventurous stepsister-to-be.

name: Stir Crazy
summary_text: Set up and wrongfully accused, two best friends will be sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit. However, no prison cell could keep them locked in.

name: Mystery, Alaska
summary_text: This comedy is about the residents of a small town who get over-excited when their hockey team gets chosen to host a televised event

name: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
summary_text: Malcolm Turner and his stepson Trent go undercover at an all-girls school to flush out a killer.

name: View from the Top
summary_text: A small-town woman tries to achieve her goal of becoming a flight attendant.

name: Holiday: A Soldier is Never Off Duty
summary_text: A soldier on vacation finds himself hunting down a terrorist. A military officer attempts to hunt down a terrorist, destroy a terrorist gang and deactivate the sleeper cells under its command.

name: Scarface
summary_text: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

name: Border
summary_text: A customs officer who can smell fear develops an unusual attraction to a strange traveler while aiding a police investigation which will call into question her entire existence.

name: Heavyweights
summary_text: Plump kids are lured into joining a posh fat camp with the promise of quick weight loss and good times, only to find that the facility is a woodland hellhole run by a psycho ex-fitness instructor.

name: The Rookie
summary_text: A veteran detective gets stuck with a rookie cop when in pursuit of a German crook.

name: Mutant Chronicles
summary_text: 28th century soldier Mitch Hunter leads a fight against an army of underworld Mutants.

name: Rookie of the Year
summary_text: When an accident miraculously gives a boy an incredibly powerful pitching arm, he becomes a major league pitcher for the Chicago Cubs.

name: Mr. Nice Guy
summary_text: A Chinese chef accidentally gets involved with a news reporter who filmed a drug bust that went awry, and is now being chased by gangs who are trying to get the video tape.

name: Jesus Christ Superstar
summary_text: Film version of the musical stage play, presenting the last few weeks of Christ's life told in an anachronistic manner.

name: Jaane Tu
summary_text: Two best friends being convinced that they are not in love search for each other's love.
